entry.title: New release for DumbPad: v1.0.0 - Initial Release
entry.content:
Versioned docker tags added! ðŸš€

  • https://hub.docker.com/r/dumbwareio/dumbpad/tags

At the moment you can use dumbwareio/dumbpad:1.0.0 or dumbwareio/dumbpad:latest as the docker image - moving forward any new changes will become a version release and you can always update/rollback to other versions as needed

What's Changed:

 * Update input type for the PIN element from 'text' to 'password'. by @shivamsnaik in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/3 * Add a COOKIE property to store the last used notes while creation, deletion, and loading notepads. by @shivamsnaik in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/4 * Add print functionality, Custom site title, and BASE_URL support by @abiteman in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/11 * Update Readme & Add New Logo by @abiteman in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/12 * Update CORS configuration to use BASE_URL environment variable by @greirson in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/14 * Added Co-editing/Realtime collaboration by @abiteman in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/17 * Update README.md - Promote Collaborative editing to feature by @Justinzobel in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/20 * Notepad Name Change autofocus and Enter to save by @abiteman in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/25 * Update Cursor Tracking logic & broadcast notepad name changes by @abiteman in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/26 * Added markdown parsing to preview pane, download/print options, and collaboration mode by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/34 * Update baseurl port to same mapped port on docker compose by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/35 * Added shortcuts for notepad controls, tooltips for shortcuts, and status abstraction by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/36 * Added shortcut for iterating forward and backwards through notepads list by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/38 * Add Fuzzy Search for Filename and File contents searching by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/39 * Improve responsive design better pc, tablet, mobile experience by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/40 * Added PWA Registration by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/43 * Fix undefined BASE_URL issue by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/44 * Added ALLOWED_ORIGINS env variable to allow more than one origin by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/45 * Bug Fix: Update allowed origins configuration by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/46 * Import notes & Pass more env variables by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/48 * Update tooltips to show shortcuts by OS detection by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/49 * Add autosave / settings modal and code refactors by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/52 * Fix Assets dir bug docker by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/54 * Enter key save settings fix by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/55 * Refactored Settings functionality into SettingsManager by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/56 * Unify theme settings with login and app by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/57 * Add remote delete confirmation and functionality by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/58 * Add setting for using Markdown preview as default view by @gitmotion in https://github.com/DumbWareio/DumbPad/pull/59
